A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been watching and rewatching starwars films my whole life. it's a movie series that got me into movies. if you are like me\, please do not watch this film. I know you will watch it anyway but don't say I didn't worn you. The narrative in this film is a disgrace to the original trilogy. it seemed as though the script was written by someone who loosely research star wars but never actually watch one. this film's only redeeming qualities are it's musical score\, action\, and visuals. Star Wars Fans want more than just that.
